LAB2

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • LAB2.Keyboard
      • LAB2.Calculator

  • public class Calculator
extends Keyboard
    This class creates a Calculator keyboard that extends the Keyboard class as the main keyboard object. The Calculator class stores all the buttons value and code in the main keyboard.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • buttonPressed

        public void buttonPressed(java.lang.String buttoncode)
        This method overrides the buttonPressed method in the main keyboard for all the buttons except the equal sign (=). The equal sign means that the user wants to see the result of the expression. The evaluation of the expression starts by getting the last expression and passing it to the evaluate method in the EvaluateString class. The result is added to the displayedText in the main keyboard with a jump to a new line.
        Overrides:
        buttonPressed in class Keyboard
        Parameters:
        buttoncode - the code of the pressed button.
